abstract: New York Daily News implements massive corporate restructuring, laying off dozens of reporters and altering layout as part of shift to digital edition; many worry change marks end of city's tabloid era; at very least, sobering development is seen by some as indicator that recent attrition at newspapers across United States has finally hit nation’s media capital.
lead_paragraph: To veteran media watchers, the layoffs mean that the recent attrition at newspapers across the country has finally arrived in force in the nation’s media capital.

headline.main: The Daily News Layoffs and Digital Shift May Signal the Tabloid Era’s End
headline.print_headline: Layoffs and Digital Shift at The Daily News May Signal the Tabloid Era’s End

snippet: To veteran media watchers, the layoffs mean that the recent attrition at newspapers across the country has finally arrived in force in the nation’s media capital.
